subject: Fixes delete of protected rbd images

values.-1: This patch needs further work before it can be merged
values.+1: Looks good to me, but someone else must approve

Patch Set 2: Looks good to me (core reviewer)

Seems sane to me.

Patch Set 2: Looks good to me, but someone else must approve

Looks good. Later we might want to optimize it a bit, but this seems fine for now.

Patch Set 2:

Initially this patch made me a little uneasy with the hack of deleting other images(marked deleted) during delete call of image A. 
I am wondering if we should just tell the user that the volume is busy and they should try again later?
Since I am not a subject matter expert in rbd, this may not be the choice. Let me know your thoughts.

Patch Set 2: I would prefer that you didn't merge this

(4 inline comments)

I have some inline comments dosaboy for some minor issues.

And as we talked between Edward and me, for balance functional requirement and performance I have two comments:
1. I still think it will be better if we put "_cleanup_stale_images()" call to a place as a periodical job. I know currently we don't have any periodicity mechanism but do team think we need one (I means can put this in plan)? and I still like go glance-worker way, you know async-task distributed execution can use this server also (under stage 2). This should be implemented in a dedicated BP/change if we want to go this way.
2. Do you think glance-scrubber is a good candidate to do this "cleanup" work?
Any thoughts?

Thanks.
